name: PB-SHUT
description: PB-SHUT is a take on the game of "Shut the Box," which is a game played with dice.  The object is simple; you roll the dice, then choose numbers that when combined add up to the total represented by your roll.  This is how you earn points.  The program is very easy to use, there are several parameters you can set, and it also keeps track of high scores.  (The PC is your opponent.)
